mapper.insert: INSERT INTO template(name, type, fk_user_id, fk_experiment_id, fk_workflow_id, tags, is_deleted, workflow_addr, param_json_string, ggeditor_object_string,template_desc) VALUES (#{name}, #{type},#{fkUserId},#{fkExperimentId},#{fkWorkflowId},#{tags},#{isDeleted},#{workflowAddr}, #{paramJsonString},#{ggeditorObjectString}, #{templateDesc});
mapper.select: select template.id as id, template.name as name, template.type as type, template.fk_user_id as fkUserId, template.fk_workflow_id as fkWorkflowId, template.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, template.tags as tags, template.is_deleted as isDeleted, template.workflow_addr as workflowAddr, template.param_json_string as paramJsonString, template.ggeditor_object_string as ggeditorObjectString, template.template_desc as templateDesc from template where template.id= #{templateId}

select template.id as id, template.name as name, template.type as type, template.fk_user_id as fkUserId, template.fk_workflow_id as fkWrokflowId, template.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, template.tags as tags, template.is_deleted as isDeleted, template.workflow_addr as workflowAddr, template.param_json_string as paramJsonString, template.ggeditor_object_string as ggeditorObjectString, template.template_desc as templateDesc from template where template.id=template.id and template.type= #{type} and template.fk_user_id = #{fkUserId} and template.fk_workflow_id = #{fkWorkflowId} and template.is_deleted = #{isDeleted} and template.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and template.tags like CONCAT('%',#{tags},'%') and template.template_desc like CONCAT('%',#{templateDesc},'%')
